alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:13PM CDT until June 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 313 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Batesland, or 16 miles north of Gordon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Merriman, Hoover Lake, Irwin, Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road, Shell Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Bayonne. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 113 and 138. Highway 61 between mile markers 225 and 228. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
